name: The Search of Lexis
description:
This is a game of the platform genre where the objective is to reach the end of the cave as you collect magic crystals and scrap wood to face the enemies that roam the area.

Lexis, a researcher from the Vallonder empire, goes into some recently unlocked caves in search of information that may be useful or interesting to both her and her friends, finding monsters to defeat to break through the platforms that make up that cave.
